targets.rawSql: SELECT timestamp AS "time", concat(metric,"_", source) AS "metric", value AS "value" FROM aqi_telemetry.telemetry WHERE (metric NOT LIKE '%battery%' AND metric NOT LIKE '%time%' AND $__timeFilter(timestamp))

sql.whereString: (metric NOT LIKE '%battery%' AND metric NOT LIKE '%time%' AND $__timeFilter(timestamp))

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  metric AS metric,
  value
FROM telemetry
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND metric = 'temp'
  AND source like '%weather_%'
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  metric AS metric,
  value
FROM telemetry
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND metric = 'pressure'
  AND source like '%weather_%'
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  metric AS metric,
  value
FROM telemetry
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND metric = 'humidity'
  AND source like '%weather_%'
ORDER BY timestamp

panels.description: Airthings devices use non-dispersive infrared (NDIR) sensors to measure indoor carbon dioxide (\(CO_{2}\)) levels, which are primarily produced by human breathing. High indoor \(CO_{2}\) levels can negatively impact focus and sleep and are often caused by poor ventilation. Airthings provides real-time data through an app or dashboard and may offer alerts or visual cues to signal when levels are too high, encouraging users to ventilate by opening a window or door.Â

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  metric AS metric,
  value
FROM telemetry
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND metric = 'co2'
  AND source like '%home_%'
ORDER BY timestamp

panels.title: co2

panels.description: Airthings measures Volatile Organic Compounds (VOCs) using a metal-oxide based sensor that reacts to various chemicals. This sensor can detect most VOCs, although it cannot differentiate between them. VOCs are important to monitor as they can cause serious health effects in both the short and long term.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  metric AS metric,
  value
FROM telemetry
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND metric = 'voc'
  AND source like '%home_%'
ORDER BY timestamp
